Class Comportement

java.lang.Object
calc_test.Comportement
public class Comportement extends Object
Class gathering all the methods used to set a behavior to a button
Author:
Stagiaire_XMA

    protected static void
    boutonRetour(org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Button pBouton)
    Method used to set the return button behavior, if the new memory flag is off and the number on display is bigger than 1, it splits the last numeral from the number, if the number on display's size is equal to 1 but is not a "0" its set the number on display to "0".
    protected static void
    boutonSeparateur(org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Button pBouton)
    Method used to set the "," button behavior, if the number on display already has a "," it does nothing otherwise it adds a "," to the number on display.

  • Method Details

    • definition

      protected static void definition(int typeBouton, org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Button bouton)
      Method used for behavior definition it takes the button, and the button's "familly" (actually an int) and passes the throught a swith case.
      Parameters:
      typeBouton - the button's familly, from 0 (numeric button) to 7 (advanced computation button)
      bouton - newly created nb : the case 6 (Sci button used for swtiching from normal mode to "Scientifique" mode is processed differently

    • boutonFonctionAvancee

      protected static void boutonFonctionAvancee(org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Button pBouton)
      Method used to set the "advanced computation" behavior, does a computation and set the new memory flag to TRUE.
      Parameters:
      pBouton - passed throught the switch case.

    • boutonEgale

      protected static void boutonEgale(org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Button pBouton)
      Method used to set the equals button behavior, set the number on display to the memory, does a computation then reset the memory.
      Parameters:
      pBouton - passed throught the switch case.

    • boutonClear

      protected static void boutonClear(org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Button pBouton)
      Method used to set the CLEAR button behavior, sets the number on display to 0 and resets the memory.
      Parameters:
      pBouton - passed throught the switch case

    • boutonFonction

      protected static void boutonFonction(org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Button pBouton)
      Method that takes the selected button and directs action to do based on the seleted button and on what's already in memory. - If no operant registered, takes the number on display as well as the operant pushed and puts them in memory - Else checks if the pushed button is the same the the operant from the memory. - If yes puts the new number on display in the memory and does the computation. - Also check if the new memory flag is true. - If not the number on display overwrties the first memory. - if not stops here. - Else the number on display is put in le second memory, computation is done, the first memory is overwriten with the new number on display and the operant is registerd. Sets the new memory flag to TRUE.
      Parameters:
      pBouton - passed throught the switch case

    • boutonSeparateur

      protected static void boutonSeparateur(org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Button pBouton)
      Method used to set the "," button behavior, if the number on display already has a "," it does nothing otherwise it adds a "," to the number on display. If the new memory flag is TRUE , it set the number on display to "0," and sets the flag yo FALSE.
      Parameters:
      pBouton - passed throught the switch case

    • boutonRetour

      protected static void boutonRetour(org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Button pBouton)
      Method used to set the return button behavior, if the new memory flag is off and the number on display is bigger than 1, it splits the last numeral from the number, if the number on display's size is equal to 1 but is not a "0" its set the number on display to "0". If the new memory flag is true, it sets the number on display to "0" and the flag to FALSE.
      Parameters:
      pBouton - passed throught the switch case

    • boutonNumerique

      protected static void boutonNumerique(org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Button pBouton)
      Method used to set the behaviro of numeric buttons and of the button (-), can only have one "-". Also, sets the new memroy flag to FALSE.
      Parameters:
      pBouton - passed throught the switch case
